title: Substack’s pivot to video is now on your TV
description: Today Substack announced it’s launching a Substack TV app for Apple TV and Google TV, the latest step in its yearslong quest to become a social app. It will support both video posts and livestreams, and it’ll have a “For You” section for recommendations.
